title: Find Maximum Value
description: Find the largest number in an array
instructions:
Write a function `findMax(arr)` that takes an array of numbers and returns the largest number.

Example: findMax([3, 7, 2, 9, 1]) should return 9

hints.content: Start by assuming the first element is the maximum, then compare it with all other elements.
Initialize a variable `max` with the first array element (arr[0]). Then loop through the rest of the array and update max if you find a larger value.
Set `let max = arr[0];` then loop from index 1: `for (let i = 1; i < arr.length; i++)`. Use `if (arr[i] > max) { max = arr[i]; }` to update the maximum.
